text:
Hey, everyone! First things first, Merry Christmas! :christmas_tree:

I'm Tanaaz, a freelance content,and copywriter based in India. I primarily write within the Health & Tech space. When I'm not writing, I'm reading about cool things happening in science and penning down my thoughts on them :bulb:

Super stoked to be part of this group! Looking forward to contributing and learning from y'all :wave:

elements.text: Hey, everyone! First things first, Merry Christmas!

text:
Hi Friends,
I'm Yemi, a freelance content writer in the B2B saas tech from the Giant of Africa (Nigeria). I enjoy writing mouth-watering long-form articles that engage and brings good conversion for my clients. I enjoy spending time with my beautiful wife when I am not writing juicy articles. I am a huge fan of Hubspot's blog and you will mostly find me there, reading and learning new stuff.

I found out about @superpath on Twitter and I can't wait to meet y'all and learn from all your experiences.

You can follow me on Twitter @yemioluseye. Bye y'all:hugging_face:
